General.Name: Dometic Group AB (publ)
General.Description: Dometic Group AB (publ), together with its subsidiaries, provides solutions for mobile living in the areas of food and beverage, climate, power and control, safety and security, and hygiene and sanitation in the United States, Germany, Australia, the United Kingdom, France, Italy, Sweden, the Netherlands, Canada, Japan, and internationally. The company offers climate and comfort products, such as air conditioners, blinds, windows and doors, ventilation products, camping tents and furniture, and awnings and accessories; food and beverage products, including refrigerators, cool boxes and related accessories, hobs, ovens, extractor hoods, sinks, and kitchen accessories; and safety and security products comprising safety doors, alarm systems, safes, gas detectors, sanitation accessories, parking aids, carbon monoxide detectors, security locks, and safety handrails, as well as accessories consist of assembly kits, mount sets, sine inverters, cables, batteries, king pins, hitch balls, brackets, and others. It also provides power and control solutions, which include energy and lighting, marine control, control devices, and related accessories; marine steering systems comprising actuators, helms, joysticks, pumps, hose and tubing products, and power assisted systems, as well as steering cylinders, kits, pumps, cables, and accessories; and hygiene and sanitation products, such as toilets, pumps, tanks, chemicals and consumables, and water heaters, as well as related accessories. Dometic Group AB (publ) offers its products for use in recreational vehicles, pleasure boats, workboats, trucks, cars, and others. The company was founded in 1922 and is headquartered in Solna, Sweden.

2.Name: Ms. Eva  Karlsson
2.Title: Exec. VP & Head of Group Operations
